name: Grocery Bag Blitz
description:
Title: Grocery Bag Blitz

Platform: PC

Genre: Puzzle

Rating: E

Target Market: Casual gamers

Game Overview:

Grocery Bag Blitz is a pick up and play 2D puzzle game where you play as a grocery bagger trying to quickly pack up each customer's items before they get impatient and call the manager. Players are challenged to fit a random assortment of cans, cheeses, bread, and cereal into the small bags before time runs out, racking up new job titles for good performance.

Instructions:

Drag and drop items into the bag with the mouse before time runs out and make sure not to drop anything. Complete waves to earn prestigious job titles.

Game Design Team:

Krieger - Lead Game Designer

Krieger - Game Director

Krieger - Team Mascot

Krieger - Intern who gets coffee for everyone else
